cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keseki

sentence.kanji: 風邪のため今日は欠席します。
sentence.romaji: kaze no tame kyou ha keseki shimasu
sentence.english: I'll be absent today because of a cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomonau

sentence.kanji: その仕事は危険を伴う。
sentence.romaji: sono shigoto ha kiken wo tomonau
sentence.english: Danger comes with the job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maku

sentence.kanji: 彼は頭にタオルを巻いていた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha atama ni taoru wo maite ita
sentence.english: He had a towel tied around his head.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansode

sentence.kanji: 今日は、半袖のシャツを着よう。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha 、 hansode no shatsu wo kiyou 。
sentence.english: I'll put on a short-sleeved shirt today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hantoshi

sentence.kanji: 日本に来て半年になります。
sentence.romaji: nipon ni kite hantoshi ni narimasu
sentence.english: It has been half a year since I came to Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nidoto

sentence.kanji: もうここには二度と来ません。
sentence.romaji: mou koko ni ha nidoto kimasen
sentence.english: I'll never come here again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maido

sentence.kanji: 毎度ありがとうございます。
sentence.romaji: maido arigatou gozaimasu
sentence.english: Thank you for your patronage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kate

sentence.kanji: 勝手なことばかり言わないでくれ。
sentence.romaji: kate na koto bakari iwanaide kure
sentence.english: Don't say self-centered things all the time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukisoku

sentence.kanji: 最近、不規則な生活をしている。
sentence.romaji: saikin fukisoku na seikatsu wo shite iru
sentence.english: My life has been quite disorganized lately.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitaku

sentence.kanji: 支度ができたら出かけましょう。
sentence.romaji: shitaku ga dekitara dekakemashou
sentence.english: Let's go out when we are ready.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kari

sentence.kanji: この借りは必ず返します。
sentence.romaji: kono kari ha kanarazu kaeshimasu
sentence.english: I will definitely pay it back.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ken

sentence.kanji: 入場券をお持ちですか。
sentence.romaji: nyuujouken wo o mochi desu ka
sentence.english: Do you have an admission ticket?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisuuken

sentence.kanji: バスの回数券を買いました。
sentence.romaji: basu no kaisuuken wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a strip of tickets for the bus.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maeuriken

sentence.kanji: コンサートの前売り券を手に入れたんだ。
sentence.romaji: konsa-to no maeuriken wo te ni ireta n da
sentence.english: I got an advance ticket for the concert.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyakuseki

sentence.kanji: 私たちは客席に座ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha kyakuseki ni suwata n da
sentence.english: We sat on the seat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chakuseki

sentence.kanji: みなさん、着席してください。
sentence.romaji: minasan chakuseki shite kudasai
sentence.english: Everybody, please be seated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoubu

sentence.kanji: 勝負はまだ始まったばかりよ。
sentence.romaji: shoubu ha mada hajimata bakari yo
sentence.english: The match has just started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shakin

sentence.kanji: 彼は友達に借金をしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tomodachi ni shakin wo shita n da
sentence.english: He borrowed money from a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuman

sentence.kanji: 私は彼のやり方には不満です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no yarikata ni ha fuman desu
sentence.english: I'm dissatisfied with his way of doing things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakaba

sentence.kanji: 彼は30代の半ばです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha 30 dai no nakaba desu
sentence.english: He's in his mid-thirties.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furi

sentence.kanji: 彼は今、不利な立場にいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ima furi na tachiba ni imasu
sentence.english: He's at a disadvantage now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabitabi

sentence.kanji: 彼から度々メールが来ます。
sentence.romaji: kare kara tabitabi me-ru ga kimasu
sentence.english: I often get email from him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dowasure

sentence.kanji: 彼の名前を度忘れしたぞ。
sentence.romaji: kare no namae wo dowasure shita zo
sentence.english: His name has completely slipped from my memory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konotabi

sentence.kanji: この度はご結婚おめでとうございます。
sentence.romaji: konotabi ha gokekon omedetou gozaimasu
sentence.english: Congratulations on your marriage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fushigi

sentence.kanji: それはとても不思議な話だね。
sentence.romaji: sore ha totemo fushigi na hanashi da ne
sentence.english: It's a very mysterious story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zaseki

sentence.kanji: 飛行機の座席はゆったりしていたよ。
sentence.romaji: hikouki no zaseki ha yutari shite ita yo
sentence.english: The airplane seat was spacious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukanzen

sentence.kanji: このデータはまだ不完全ね。
sentence.romaji: kono de-ta ha mada fukanzen ne
sentence.english: This data is still unfinished.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouhai

sentence.kanji: このセットで勝敗が決まります。
sentence.romaji: kono seto de shouhai ga kimarimasu
sentence.english: Victory or defeat will be decided in this set.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fumei

sentence.kanji: その病気は原因不明と言われているんだよ。
sentence.romaji: sono byouki ha genin fumei to iwareteiru n da yo
sentence.english: The cause of this illness is said to be unknown.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouken

sentence.kanji: 証券を売って資金にしようと思うの。
sentence.romaji: shouken wo ute shikin ni shiyou to omou no
sentence.english: I'm thinking of selling some securities and converting them to funds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusei

sentence.kanji: 試験で不正が見つかったよ。
sentence.romaji: shiken de fusei ga mitsukata yo
sentence.english: Cheating was discovered in the examination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuantei

sentence.kanji: 最近、体調が少し不安定です。
sentence.romaji: saikin taichou ga sukoshi fuantei desu
sentence.english: Recently, my physical condition is a little unstable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuan

sentence.kanji: 明日、病院に検査に行くので少し不安です。
sentence.romaji: asu byouin ni kensa ni iku no de sukoshi fuan desu
sentence.english: I'm a bit worried since I have to go to the hospital for tests tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenhan

sentence.kanji: 相手チームのリードで前半が終わったよ。
sentence.romaji: aite chi-mu no ri-do de zenhan ga owata yo
sentence.english: The first half ended with the opposing team in the lead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futashika

sentence.kanji: 人の記憶は不確かよ。
sentence.romaji: hito no kioku ha futashika yo
sentence.english: Human memories are unreliable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fushizen

sentence.kanji: 彼の態度はどこか不自然だったな。
sentence.romaji: kare no taido ha dokoka fushizen data na
sentence.english: His behavior was somewhat unnatural.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koudo

sentence.kanji: 高度な技術を持つ人材を集めました。
sentence.romaji: koudo na gijutsu wo motsu jinzai wo atsumemashita
sentence.english: We've attracted highly-skilled personnel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanko

sentence.kanji: ここに判子を押してください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni hanko wo oshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please put your personal seal here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kachi

sentence.kanji: 歌合戦は赤組の勝ちでしたね。
sentence.romaji: utagasen ha aka gumi no kachi deshita ne
sentence.english: The red team won the singing contest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukyou

sentence.kanji: 不況の影響で仕事が少ないね。
sentence.romaji: fukyou no eikyou de shigoto ga sukunai ne
sentence.english: There's little work due to the recession.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuun

sentence.kanji: 彼に不運な出来事が起こったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ni fuun na dekigoto ga okota no
sentence.english: He suffered an unfortunate incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuchuui

sentence.kanji: その事故は運転手の不注意が原因で起きたの。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko ha untenshu no fuchuui ga genin de okita no
sentence.english: The accident happened due to the driver's carelessness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katate

sentence.kanji: 片手運転は危ないよ。
sentence.romaji: katate unten ha abunaiyo
sentence.english: Single-handed driving is dangerous.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katahou

sentence.kanji: 片方の目がかゆいです。
sentence.romaji: katahou no me ga kayui desu
sentence.english: One of my eyes is itchy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katagawa

sentence.kanji: この道は片側通行です。
sentence.romaji: kono michi ha katagawa tsuukou desu
sentence.english: This road is a one-way street.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shupan

sentence.kanji: この本は15年前に出版された。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha juugonenmae ni shupan sareta
sentence.english: This book was published 15 years ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shupansha

sentence.kanji: 彼女は出版社で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shupansha de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: She works for a publisher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fugoukaku

sentence.kanji: 残念ながら試験は不合格でした。
sentence.romaji: zannen nagara shiken ha fugoukaku deshita
sentence.english: To our regret, he failed the examination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bukiyou

sentence.kanji: 妹は不器用で、料理も苦手なの。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha bukiyou de ryouri mo nigate na no
sentence.english: My little sister is clumsy and not good at cooking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukashi

sentence.kanji: 彼は昔は貧乏だった。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mukashi ha binbou data
sentence.english: He used to be poor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toboshii

sentence.kanji: 彼女はまだ仕事の経験が乏しい。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mada shigoto no keiken ga toboshii。
sentence.english: She still lacks work experience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's binbounin

sentence.kanji: 貧乏人が大金持ちになることもあるさ。
sentence.romaji: binbounin ga ooganemochi ni naru koto mo aru sa
sentence.english: Occasionally, poor people can become millionaires.
